Topic.Title: Disappointed with QuestNet not being part of program

Posts.EditableText:
I'm a little disappointed with QuestNet not being part of the program anymore. That's what drew me to this product so I could develop MUD games with it. That's what really caught my attention.
My heart hath been stabbed. <|3
Posts.HTML:
I'm a little disappointed with QuestNet not being part of the program anymore. That's what drew me to this product so I could develop MUD games with it. That's what really caught my attention.
My heart hath been stabbed. <|3

Posts.EditableText:
Sorry to disappoint! It seems very few people were interested in making multi-player games, which is why I've removed QuestNet Server from Quest 4.1.

However, Quest Pro users can still download Quest Pro 4.0.5, which includes QuestNet Server Pro 4.0.5, and if you find any bugs in this version I'll do my best to fix them.
